name: Magnetic Suction Tube
Lore: 'Retractable tube originally designed to collect mined materials for transport to refining facilities. Jawas now use it to suck up droids (and anything else that''s not nailed down).',
Text: 'Deploy on your sandcrawler. Once during each of your control phases, may target one character present. Draw destiny. If destiny > character''s ability, ''suck up'' character (relocate to related interior Sandcrawler site or owner''s Used Pile).',
